description.@en: You are granted the gift of great speed and military prowess.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, you can immediately make an Opportunity Attack with a melee weapon. In addition, you can make a Called Shot with a melee weapon or Melee Attack for 0 APs for the Duration of the spell. However, you can only use one Attack Action on your Turn.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and you can make two Attack Actions on your Turn, spending 0 APs for each.

criticalFailure.@en: You have made a grave mistake and angered your god. Your body is wracked by electricity, as you suffer [[/roll 2D10+2]] physical Peril.

reagents.@en: A charm that is shaped like a lightning bolt
